{
  "title": "Ticket Pricing: How Discounts and Tiers Work",
  "intro": "Welcome to the Ticket Pricing module where we explore how discounts and tiered offerings can turn a simple seat into a compelling purchase. In just a few minutes you will learn to craft early‑bird offers that spark urgency, match VIP packages with added perks, structure group discounts that reward bulk buyers, keep a flexible price calendar, and speak to customers about value rather than cost. You will also see real‑world examples that illustrate timing, scarcity, and the psychology behind each pricing lever. By the end you will be able to translate these concepts into clear, persuasive messages that close more sales and boost revenue.",
  "sections": [
    {
      "title": "Understanding Scarcity and Early‑Bird Pricing",
      "content": "Scarcity works because people assign higher value to items that appear limited. In ticket sales the most powerful lever is early‑bird pricing which announces a limited window at...
